message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.AI 

This paper presents an open embodied avatar with capabilities for lip syncing, head gesture, and facial expression. These features are relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including human-computer interaction (cs.HC), graphics (cs.GR), computer vision (cs.CV), multimedia (cs.MM), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). However, given the focus on nonverbal social and interactional cues, as well as the use of public APIs to create a simple conversational agent, cs.HC and cs.GR are the most likely sub-categories.
